text: Viktor Pitirimov (born 2 June 1968) is a Soviet rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Unified Team Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Viktor Pitirimov
